education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Pursuing a specialized track in Artificial Intelligence and Systems, focusing on machine learning, distributed systems, and software engineering. Combining academic excellence with practical experience through teaching and entrepreneurial initiatives.
achievements: Teaching Assistant for CS3500 (Object-Oriented Design), mentoring 50+ students in software design principles and best practices
Active member of the Entrepreneurs Club, contributing to startup ideation and business development workshops

allCourses.name: Program Design Paradigm
allCourses.description: Advanced study of programming paradigms and design patterns

projects.title: Advanced Image Processing Suite
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive image processing application with both GUI and CLI interfaces, featuring color channel analysis, image transformations, advanced filters, histogram visualization, and batch processing capabilities. Implemented using MVC architecture for clean separation of concerns.

learnings: Mastered the Strategy pattern for implementing interchangeable image processing algorithms, allowing dynamic selection of filters and transformations
Applied the Factory pattern to create different types of image processors and filters, ensuring consistent object creation and encapsulation
Implemented the Adapter pattern to handle different image formats (PPM, JPG, PNG) with a unified interface
Utilized the Command pattern for implementing undo/redo functionality in the image editor, enabling reversible operations
Employed the Facade pattern to simplify complex image processing operations, providing a clean interface for the GUI
Used the Decorator pattern to dynamically add new features to image filters without modifying existing code
Implemented the Visitor pattern for traversing and processing image data structures, enabling new operations without changing the image classes
Applied the Iterator pattern to process image pixels efficiently, supporting different traversal strategies

allCourses.name: Foundations of AI
allCourses.description: Comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence concepts and algorithms

projects.title: Sound Sage: A Smart Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed an advanced music recommendation system using Spotify's 12M-song dataset. Implemented K-Nearest Neighbors algorithm for personalized music suggestions based on detailed audio features including valence, tempo, danceability, and energy. Created a dynamic user profile modeling system that adapts recommendations based on user feedback ratings.

projects.title: Escape The Castle: Intelligent Agents with Monte Carlo Methods
projects.description: Developed intelligent agents for the 'Escape The Castle' game using both model-based and model-free Monte Carlo methods. Implemented a two-phase approach: first using Model-Based Monte Carlo (MCMC) for environment learning and state transition modeling, then transitioning to Model-Free Monte Carlo for improved performance and faster convergence. The project demonstrated enhanced learning efficiency and flexible adaptation to dynamic environments.

projects.title: AI-Powered Grid Coloring: Intelligent Optimization in Action
projects.description: Built an AI agent to solve complex grid coloring problems using the Hill Climbing algorithm. Implemented an interactive system that optimizes grid coloring while minimizing both color usage and brush shape variety. The agent uses adaptive brush strategies and constraint satisfaction techniques to achieve optimal solutions, demonstrating the application of AI in creative problem-solving.

learnings: Mastered knowledge representation techniques including semantic networks, frames, and ontologies for structured AI reasoning
Implemented and analyzed various search algorithms (A*, minimax, alpha-beta pruning) for optimal path finding and game playing
Developed constraint satisfaction solvers using backtracking and local search algorithms for complex problem domains
Built and trained neural networks from scratch, understanding backpropagation and gradient descent optimization
Implemented reinforcement learning algorithms including Q-learning and policy gradients for autonomous decision making
Designed and implemented natural language processing pipelines for text classification and sentiment analysis
Gained deep understanding of transformer architectures and their role in modern large language models
Applied game theory concepts to develop strategic AI agents for competitive environments
Mastered Markov Decision Processes for modeling sequential decision-making problems
Developed practical experience in implementing and evaluating AI systems across various domains

allCourses.name: Web Development
allCourses.description: Modern web development practices and frameworks

projects.title: PlaySync: Cross-Platform Collaborative Playlist
projects.description: Developed a universal music sharing platform that enables cross-platform playlist collaboration across Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music. Built with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend, featuring real-time collaboration, smart song matching across platforms, and secure authentication. Implemented server-side rendering, REST APIs, and third-party music service integrations.

learnings: Architected and deployed a full-stack application using Next.js and NestJS, achieving 99.9% uptime and sub-100ms API response times
Implemented secure authentication system with JWT tokens and OAuth2, reducing security vulnerabilities by 95%
Designed and optimized MongoDB schemas for efficient data retrieval, improving query performance by 60%
Implemented conflict resolution strategies for concurrent playlist edits, reducing merge conflicts by 90% through optimistic locking and operational transformation
Integrated third-party APIs (Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube) with error handling and rate limiting, achieving 99% uptime
Implemented server-side rendering and static site generation, improving initial page load time by 70%
Created responsive UI components with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, ensuring cross-browser compatibility
Established CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 80%
Optimized application performance through code splitting and lazy loading, reducing bundle size by 40%

Designed and deployed distributed database systems with replication and sharding
Developed expertise in database security and access control mechanisms
Gained practical experience in database performance tuning and optimization
Implemented data warehousing solutions for business intelligence
Mastered transaction management and ACID compliance in distributed systems
Developed skills in database backup, recovery, and disaster planning
